Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Fugue in F-sharp major, BWV Anh. 97

? · BWV3 App A 23

[IMSLP]

This fugue is probably spurious; another attribution is to Johann Ludwig Krebs. The fugue includes a part for pedal, but can still be played effectively on an instrument without pedals.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV, 11 · BA 5100-01 · Freie Orgelwerke und Choralpartiten aus unterschiedlicher Überlieferung · ed. Ulrich Bartels / Peter Wollny

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3
